items.name: Malachai's Loop
explicitMods: 20% chance to gain a Power Charge on Hit
16% increased Spell Damage per Power Charge
Lose all Power Charges on reaching Maximum Power Charges
Shocks you when you reach Maximum Power Charges
flavourText: Thaumaturgy has no limit.
It is our fragile reality that imposes boundaries.

socketedItems.secDescrText: Supports any non-blessing skill. Minions cannot gain the Lifetap buff.
explicitMods: Supported Skills Cost Life instead of Mana

Gain Lifetap after Spending a total of 188 Life on Upfront
Costs and Effects of a Supported Skill
Supported Skills deal 18% more Damage while you have Lifetap
socketedItems.descrText: This is a Support Gem. It does not grant a bonus to your character, but to skills in sockets connected to it. Place into an item socket connected to a socket containing the Skill Gem you wish to augment. Right click to remove from a socket.

socketedItems.secDescrText:
Supports skills with cooldowns.
Cannot support triggered skills.

Supported Non-Instant Skills have +1 Cooldown Use
socketedItems.descrText: This is a Support Gem. It does not grant a bonus to your character, but to skills in sockets connected to it. Place into an item socket connected to a socket containing the Skill Gem you wish to augment. Right click to remove from a socket.

properties.name: Spell, Movement, Duration, Fire, Travel, Blink

socketedItems.secDescrText: Teleport to a location, damaging enemies and leaving a trail of burning ground in your wake. Shares a cooldown with other Blink skills.
explicitMods: Deals 1738.6 Base Fire Damage per second
socketedItems.descrText: Place into an item socket of the right colour to gain this skill. Right click to remove from a socket.

items.name: Badge of the Brotherhood
explicitMods: Your Maximum Frenzy Charges is equal to your Maximum Power Charges
8% increased Cooldown Recovery Rate of Travel Skills per Frenzy Charge
7% increased Effect of Elusive on you per Power Charge
24% chance to lose a Frenzy Charge when you use a Travel Skill
22% chance to lose a Power Charge when you gain Elusive
flavourText: Greater than any blade, agility and intellect will be your weapons.

items.name: Circle of Nostalgia
explicitMods: +40% to Chaos Resistance while affected by Herald of Agony
Herald of Agony has 53% increased Buff Effect
flavourText: I was a happy child, before the cruel truth was revealed to me.
I fight so that the children may remain ignorant.

items.typeLine: Dabbler's Quicksilver Flask of the Skink
explicitMods: Immunity to Bleeding and Corrupted Blood during Effect
items.descrText: Right click to drink. Can only hold charges while in belt. Refills as you kill monsters.

items.typeLine: Abecedarian's Amethyst Flask of the Order
craftedMods: Regenerate 3% of Life per second during Effect
items.descrText: Right click to drink. Can only hold charges while in belt. Refills as you kill monsters.

items.name: Ralakesh's Impatience
explicitMods: Lose all Frenzy, Endurance, and Power Charges when you Move

Minimum Endurance Charges equal to Maximum while stationary
Minimum Frenzy Charges equal to Maximum while stationary
Minimum Power Charges equal to Maximum while stationary
flavourText: For the immortal, what is the difference
between an age and an instant?

socketedItems.secDescrText: When used at range, throws out a chain, pulling you to the enemy hit dealing damage in an area behind them. When close to the enemy, just causes the area damage directly. Requires a One Handed Mace, Sceptre, Sword or Axe.
explicitMods: Gain 1 Rage if this Skill Hits any Enemies
socketedItems.descrText: Place into an item socket of the right colour to gain this skill. Right click to remove from a socket.

items.name: Void Battery
explicitMods: 25% increased Spell Damage per Power Charge
flavourText: "The trick is to give nothingness,
and to receive everything in return."
- Inquisitor Maligaro

socketedItems.secDescrText: Each supported spell skill will be triggered when you die. Cannot support skills used by totems, traps, or mines. Vaal skills, channelling skills, and skills with a reservation cannot be triggered.
explicitMods: You cannot Cast Supported Triggerable Spells directly
100% chance to Trigger Supported Non-Minion Spells on Death

Not so, the battle for survival.

socketedItems.secDescrText: Casts an aura that grants evasion to you and your allies.
explicitMods: You and nearby allies gain 2575 additional Evasion Rating

socketedItems.secDescrText: Engulfs you in magical fire that rapidly burns you and nearby enemies. Your spell damage is substantially increased while under this effect. The effect ends when you have 1 life remaining.
explicitMods: Deals 2447.9 Base Fire Damage per second
Deals 35% of your Maximum Life as Base Fire Damage per second
Deals 35% of your Maximum Energy Shield as Base Fire Damage per second
You Burn for 90% of your Maximum Life per second as Fire Damage
You Burn for 70% of your Maximum Energy Shield per second as Fire Damage
socketedItems.descrText: Place into an item socket of the right colour to gain this skill. Right click to remove from a socket.

socketedItems.secDescrText: Casts an aura that grants bonuses to damage and critical strike chance of spells to you and your allies, and gives a chance to create Consecrated Ground against stronger enemies.

You and nearby allies have 39% increased Spell Critical Strike Chance
You and nearby allies deal 15% more Spell Damage

socketedItems.secDescrText: Enchants your shield with the power of storms, which lashes out to deal arcing lightning damage to attackers when you block them.

items.name: Surgebinders
implicitMods: Curse Enemies with Elemental Weakness on Hit
explicitMods: 7% increased Elemental Damage per Frenzy Charge
4% increased Physical Damage per Endurance Charge
5% increased Spell Damage per Power Charge
10% chance to Steal Power, Frenzy, and Endurance Charges on Hit
flavourText: Your lies are our strength.
Your threats are our laughter.
Your hate is our infinity
The fire rises!

socketedItems.secDescrText: Creates a crystal that pulses with cold for a duration. Each pulse applies a debuff to nearby enemies for a secondary duration which reduces life and energy shield regeneration rate, and also inflicts Cold Exposure. When the crystal's duration ends, it explodes, dealing heavy cold damage to enemies around it.
explicitMods: 4% more Damage with Hits per 0.1 seconds Duration
Cold Exposure applies -15% to Cold Resistance
